title.rendered: Learning Digital Marketing from Digiperform is helping me to grow our clients’ business. – Sana Shaikh

content.rendered:
Learning has no limits and boundaries. This has been clearly manifested by our one of the trainees in Mumbai – Sana Shaikh who is a full stack developer by profession and a complete marketer by passion. During her developer days, she believed that her career has not been limited to just developing. She could be a developer, marketer, strategist and many more. She never wanted to limit herself to just one role. All-rounder! She has believed that one should go along with the current trend where she realized digital marketing is the new trend. With the zeal to get master in this new version of marketing, she joined Digiperform’s dCDMC – digital marketing course and started incorporating learning in her digital marketing strategies. In a chit-chat session, we decided to ask how her journey has been so far and how Digiperform played its role. Let’s read more…  

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Sana: Hi, I am Sana Shaikh, an engineer by education and a full stack developer by profession. Also, I believe, I’m a marketer by passion.

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Sana: I have always been very keen on keeping myself updated about the latest trends whether it’s an online marketing, technology or fashion. Being a developer for 4 years, I realized that I have always wanted to get out of my comfort zone and needed to break the bubble of limited engineering profile. I discovered the other parameters of business and felt an utter need to step out of my space where I could deal directly with the clients’ business. Along with that, I have had deep thurst where I could use my analytical and presentation skills directly in front of the clients rather than playing the side roll in the development.

Following the same zeal, I decided to go out of the box which is demanding in the current scenario and raise my skill, my bar. This eagerness led me to learn digital marketing and be part of this creative or innovative field. Digiperform: What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Sana: The most important thing I liked about Digiperform that they provide live classroom training sessions. Most of the institutes provide online sessions only which I feel not sufficient enough if you want to learn anything. The Classroom training is the USP of Digiperform.

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Sana: During training, I  liked how they have provided and discussed live case studies that really helping me to use the knowledge to help my clients grow their brands/businesses.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Sana: Yes, I would like to recommend Digiperform as the trusted & reliable source for digital marketing learning because of their quality of curriculum and training. They make sure each student learn everything about digital marketing and get satisfied with the training.

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Sana: I would like to rate 8 out of 10.

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Sana: I have future plans for working as a freelancer for international clients as well set up my own digital marketing agency.

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Sana: I would like to suggest trainees invest their time in research various concepts and do practicals accordingly. Money can be earned back but time can’t. Trust your instincts and believe in your mentors. Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Sana: An institution that really cares for its students future. Thanks, Sana for sharing your valuable feedback. We wish you a great success in your future endeavors.
